alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 1:59PM CDT until April 15 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR WESTERN CEDAR AND NORTHERN DADE COUNTIES... At 158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Golden City, or 13 miles northwest of Greenfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. Half Dollar size hail was reported in Lamar Missouri with this storm. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake, Stockton State Park, Stockton, Greenfield, Jerico Springs, Arcola, Umber View Heights, Neola, Caplinger Mills, Wagoner, Cedarville and Sylvania. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
